channel.title: I forgot everything since i got a new computer help pl0x
channel.description:
OK well i got a new router and 2wire 2700hg-e and well i dont no how to port forward. Could someone help me. I cant port forward cause its way different like ill explain in words. This is where u supossofly port forward Settings
Profile Name Enter a name for the application profile that you are creating.
Application Name:
Definition Choose a protocol and enter the port(s) for this application, then click ADD DEFINITION to add the definition to the Definition List. If the application requires multiple ports or both TCP and UDP ports, you will need to add multiple definitions.
[img]http://i730.photobucket.com/albums/ww305/haydog35/Helpwithmoparscapeportforwarding.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i730.photobucket.com/albums/ww305/haydog35/Morehelpwithportforwarding.jpg[/img]
Note: In some rare instances, certain application types require specialized firewall changes in addition to simple port forwarding. If the application you are adding appears in the application type menu below, it is recommended that you select it. Protocol: TCP UDP Port (or Range): From: To:
Protocol Timeout (seconds): TCP default 86400 UDP default 600 Map to Host Port: Default = the same port as defined above. Application Type: None (Default) File Transfer Protocol (FTP) Microsoft Games H.323-based Internet telephony IRC (Internet relay chat) server PPTP virtual private network server '
[size=20pt]And what do i pick tcp or udp?[/size]

item.title: I forgot everything since i got a new computer help pl0x
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

You have the same router as me, yes make sure you allow the exceptions in your firewall, aswell as adding both TCP adn UDP ports with the port 43594 added to them.

I hade done everything right, but there was 2 computers with the same name, that was my problem, should work though, if not i’ll help with further instructions, pm me.

Read full topic
item.source: I forgot everything since i got a new computer help pl0x

item.title: I forgot everything since i got a new computer help pl0x
item.dc:creator: @legendmaker legendmaker
item.description:
@legendmaker wrote:

TCP AND UDP MUST BE FOWARDED BECAUSE IT RANDOMLY CHANGES PORTFOWARD BOTH OF EM

Read full topic

item.title: I forgot everything since i got a new computer help pl0x
item.dc:creator: @Bevis Bevis
item.description:
@Bevis wrote:

make two exceptions, one for tcp, and udp.

Profile Name
Enter a name for the application profile that you are creating.
